message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.GT, cs.NE 

This paper involves the use of deep learning techniques, specifically convolutional neural networks, to build a computer Mahjong player. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves training the neural network on game records, which falls under the sub-category cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the use of convolutional neural networks suggests that the paper may also fall under cs.CV (Computer Vision). The paper also involves game theory and strategy, which could place it under cs.GT (Game Theory). Finally, the use of neural networks for evaluation and prediction could also place the paper under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
